Help.image_handling_help: Choose how images are handled when exporting conversations. Each option has different benefits for file size, organization, and compatibility.
Help.embed_help: Maintains current behavior. Images are embedded directly in the export file as base64 data. Results in self-contained files but larger file sizes.
Help.text_marker_help: Replaces images with customizable text markers. Best for text-focused workflows and when you want minimal file sizes.
Help.separate_files_help: Creates a professional ZIP archive with images organized in a separate directory. Best for sharing and organization.
Help.quality_help: Controls the compression level for images in ZIP exports. Higher values preserve image quality but result in larger files.
Help.size_help: Maximum dimension for images in ZIP exports. Images larger than this will be resized to fit within this limit.
Help.metadata_help: Include detailed information about images in the export metadata, such as original URLs, dimensions, and processing details.
